string-array.name: notes_from_dev
string-array.item: You might want to send txt/sms with WebSMS for free or at least as cheap as possible. Many providers are supported Just give it a try!
Jan. 2011-2012: Try a long-click on answer/send/compose buttons to use an other than your standard app for sending.
Apr. 2011-2012: SMSdroid is now able to send SMS on it\'s own. Just use the "SMS (SMSdroid)" entry in the app chooser
